message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40% and I'll take 60%. What do you think?
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation
Okay, I'll increase my offer slightly to 55%.  But I won't go any higher.  We need to reach an agreement before the inflation gets out of control.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share considering the inflation is affecting me less
We're both losing money with every round.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.  50/50 is the fairest solution at this point.
